title: Hidden Gems of Shimla: Beyond Mall Road
content: Most tourists stick to Mall Road and Jakhu Temple, but Shimla's true magic lies in its lesser-known corners. Chadwick Falls during monsoon was a revelation – the 3 km trek through deodar forests felt like walking through a nature documentary. Tara Devi sunrise drives, the Green Valley pull-out, Summer Hill pine walks, and artisan stops at Lakkar Bazaar make the perfect slow-travel loop.

title: Shimla on a Shoestring: 3-Day Budget Guide
content: Shimla doesn't have to break the bank! Rode the Kalka toy train, trekked up Jakhu instead of taking the ropeway, refueled at Ashiana for ₹150, and chased sunsets at The Ridge. Chadwick Falls trek + Christ Church evening choir + bargaining at Lakkar Bazaar kept the ₹3k budget intact.

title: Shimla with Kids: Family-Friendly Itinerary
content: Jakhu ropeway rides, Kufri pony loops, Annandale picnics, and The Ridge ice-cream walks kept our kids entertained. Wake & Bake pancakes, Ashiana's Himachali dham, and toy shopping at Lakkar Bazaar made rewards for the steep walks.

title: Goa by Road + Rental Scooters
content: Bombay–Goa NH66 is freshly resurfaced, so we drove down then rented retro scooters at Anjuna to hop between surf-friendly Ashwem mornings, Arambol drum circles, and Reis Magos fort photo ops. Must-eats: Vinayak’s fish thali in Assagao, Kokni Kanteen in Panjim, and late-night serradura at Joseph Bar.

title: Manali + Spiti Bike Circuit
content: Rented Royal Enfields at Manali, acclimatized with Solang Valley hikes, then tackled the Atal Tunnel toward Spiti. Stopovers: Keylong cafes, Chandra Taal sunrise photography, and pin valley hot springs. Carry jerry cans, patch kits, and learn to adjust chain tension before you climb Kunzum La.

title: Meghalaya for Nature + Foodies
content: Base in Shillong for cafe culture (Try Trattoria’s pork rice) then hire a local cab to Cherrapunji’s double-decker root bridges. Kayak Dawki’s crystal river, chase Nohkalikai Falls, and photograph Laitlum Canyon at golden hour. Best months: October to April when skies stay clear.
